title: PSA: Bug in macOS 12.3 beta causes Finder to repeatedly show ‘file can’t be found’ alert
content:
If you’ve been seeing multiple Finder error messages on your Mac recently, you’re not alone. Although macOS Monterey 12.3 beta comes with some great new features, it has also been causing the Finder to repeatedly show an alert message to users.

more…

The post PSA: Bug in macOS 12.3 beta causes Finder to repeatedly show ‘file can’t be found’ alert appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The alert, which reads "The file can't be found," has been annoying Mac users running macOS 12.3 beta – but you shouldn't worry about it.
